verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] adopted a new " zero tolerance " policy that separates children and parents at the border . The United Nations human rights office called for it to be stopped immediately

The Trump administration has adopted a new " zero tolerance " policy that separates children and parents at the border . [ARG0: The United Nations human rights office] [V: called] [ARG1: for it to be stopped immediately]

The Trump administration has adopted a new " zero tolerance " policy that separates children and parents at the border . The United Nations human rights office called for it to [V: be] stopped immediately
